title: Distribute Repeating Integers
content:
You are given an array of  integers, , where there are at most 50 unique values in the array. You are also given an array of  customer order quantities, , where  is the amount of integers the  customer ordered. Determine if it is possible to distribute  such that:

The  customer gets exactly  integers,
The integers the  customer gets are all equal, and
Every customer is satisfied.

Return  if it is possible to distribute  according to the above conditions.
 










 








There are at most 50 unique values in .
